thread.title: Tell me about your tattoo (Photos)
thread.title_full: Tell me about your tattoo (Photos) | OregonLive.com

author: Kristyna Wentz-Graff | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Tell me about your tattoo (Photos)
text:
Ever wonder what stories lie behind people's tattoos? How they chose them? Or why they put them on certain places on their bodies?
We asked those questions to people attending the 7 th Annual Portland Tattoo Expo being held at the Portland Expo Center on Saturday.
Read through the cutlines for details on the stories behind the ink.
The expo continues on Sunday, 12-8 p.m. For more details, click here .
-- Kristyna Wentz-Graff
@kwgphoto
